text: Saint Ignatius of Loyola (1491-1556) was a Spanish man. He started the Jesuit order in Catholicism. He is also known for his Spiritual Exercises. ==Other websites== *Catholic encyclopaedia on Ignatius ==Related pages== *Aloysius Gonzaga Category:Christian saints Category:1491 births Category:1556 deaths Category:Spanish Roman Catholic priests Category:Jesuits
title: Ignatius of Loyola
